name: S.T.E.E.L
description:
A shoot-em-up with rogue-lite elements
and beautiful hand-drawn graphics. Planned features:
  • Procedurally generated levels with randomised enemy waves and pickups
  • Branching paths - select from 25+ levels
  • 30+ weird and wonderful bosses
  • 30+ unique weapons and items to find
  • Upgrade your ship between levels at the shop
  • Boss Rush mode
  • Online leaderboards
Download the demo now! Demo features:
  • Play through two levels out of five to choose from
  • No music in game yet. Some SFX not final.
Reviews
  • "It ****ing slaps" - A random tester
  • "Suck it! I beat the first level!" - My wife
